title: Results of European expansion, colonies and trade

content.question: Which of the following resulted from Europe’s expansion overseas in the eighteenth and nineteenth centuries?

choices.label: Europe’s population size and industrial productivity declined.
European countries acquired colonies and dominated world trade.
The number of workers needed for European factories declined.

content.answer: European countries acquired colonies and dominated world trade.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
